Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 61st/Midway Plaisance
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st EB buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, Dorchester, 63rd, Stony Island and 59th: due to,street blockage near 61st/Midway Plaisance

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, Dorchester, 63rd, Stony Island and 59th: due to,street blockage near 61st/Midway Plaisance

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute (Beach Service)
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses will not enter Hayes Drive between Stony Island Avenue and Richards Drive will be closed to all vehicular traffic due to CDOT construction.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses will not enter Hayes Drive between Stony Island Avenue and Richards Drive will be closed to all vehicular traffic due to CDOT construction.

  • Eastbound buses will operate regular route via 63rd/Stony Island, (turn right) South on Stony Island to Marquette, (turn left) East on Marquette to Richards, (turn Left) North on Richards to Hayes Dr, (turn right) East on Hayes Dr to Lakeshore Dr. (Service Stop) Service Stop and take Layover on Hayes Drive at Lake Shore Drive.
  • Westbound buses at scheduled departure time (continue) East on Hayes Dr/ Lakeshore Drive, (turn right) South on Lakeshore Drive to Marquette, (turn right) West on Marquette to Stony Island, (turn right) North on Stony Island to 64th, (turn left) West on 64th over the regular route. 

Allow extra travel time.
